info.author: Fionn Behrens
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This module allows for easy wrapping of SQL tables, simple queries and
their results in dictionary-like python datatype objects.
Attn: MySQLdb is currently mandatory for this module!
Example:

>>> res = myDB.Address.City["Oklahoma%"]
>>> len(res)
2
>>> for r in res:
...   print "%s: %s"%(r.Name, r.Phone)
John Doe: 0405-12345
Joe User: 0405-67890
>>> john = res[0]
>>> john.Phone = '0405-54321'
info.name: pSQL

This module allows for easy wrapping of SQL tables, simple queries and their results in dictionary-like python datatype objects. Attn: MySQLdb is currently mandatory for this module! Example:

>>> res = myDB.Address.City["Oklahoma%"]
